content: The Battle of Waterloo, where Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated, took place in which present-day country?

The Battle of Waterloo, where Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated, took place in present-day Belgium. Specifically, it occurred near the town of Waterloo, which is located about 15 kilometers south of Brussels. The battle was fought on June 18, 1815, and marked the final defeat of Napoleon, leading to his exile on the island of Saint Helena.
